Clinical Neuropsychological Services

Neurocognitive and psychodiagnostic services are provided for pediatric populations, forensic and medicolegal cases, as well as for adults.

Pediatric Neuropsychology

Child and adolescent neurocognitive assessment
  • Neurodevelopmental Services
  • Preschoolers
  • School-Age Children
  • Adolescents

Adult Neuropsychology

Neuropsychology of emerging adulthood including adult-onset ADHD
  • General Adult Services
  • Emerging Adulthood
  • Adult-Onset ADHD

Forensic Neuropsychology

Neurocognitive examination for forensic and medicolegal cases
  • General Forensic Services
  • Independent Medical Exams
  • Mental Health Diversion
